Song.title: Mighty, Mighty Savior
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Mark Altrogge © 2004 Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [C | C | C | C |]
Verse 1: [C]No one is good [F]No one is holy before G[Am]od [Am]I need some[G]one to cleanse me [C]No one is pure [F]No one is righteous in Your s[Am]ight [Am]I need some[G]one to save me [Dm]But I’m so glad You died and [G]rose again[| G F/A |] [Bb]For helpless [F/A]sinners like [Gsus | G]me
Chorus: What a [Am]mighty, mighty [F]Savior You a[C]re What a [Am]mighty, mighty [F]Savior You a[Gsus | G]re You can [Am]wash away my [E7]sin You can [C]change my heart with[D7]in What a [F]mighty, mighty [G]Savior You a[C]re
Verse 2: [C]Sin is too strong [F]For me to conquer on my o[Am]wn [Am]I need some[G]one to help me [C]I am too weak [F]I cannot change my evil h[Am]eart [Am]I need some[G]one to save me [Dm]But I’m so glad You died and [G]rose again[ G F/A |] [Bb]For helpless [F/A]sinners like [Gsus | G]me
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 no one is good no one is holy before god i need someone to cleanse me no one is pure no one is righteous in your sight i need someone to save me but im so glad you died and rose again for helpless sinners like me chorus what a mighty mighty savior you are what a mighty mighty savior you are you can wash away my sin you can change my heart within what a mighty mighty savior you are verse 2 sin is too strong for me to conquer on my own i need someone to help me i am too weak i cannot change my evil heart i need someone to save me but im so glad you died and rose again for helpless sinners like me
